About Me

I am a second year student persuing B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from IIT Kharagpur. My research interests lie in Autonomus Robotics and Control Systems. I am a control systems team member at Aerial Robotics Kharagpur . I have been recently introduced to Multi-robot system. I really enjoy skating and playing basketball. When doing nothing I am found listening to music or binge watching TV shows.
